About Me

I am an enthusiastic front end web developer with lots of motivation to build new things! I have been working with core technologies of the web for around nearly four years now, and really looking forward to put those in practice in a serious work-place enviroment.
Right now I am looking for a job that let's me keep growing professionally as well as personally.
